meanings.definition: An exclamation used to express disgust or contempt.
meanings.sent2: She said 'ptui' when she saw the mess on the floor.
meanings.sent3: Ptui! I can't believe you would say such a mean thing.
meanings.sent4: The idea of eating bugs made her want to shout 'ptui!'
meanings.sent5: The smell was so bad, all he could do was yell 'ptui!'

meanings.definition: To spit or expel saliva forcefully from the mouth.
meanings.sent1: He had to 'ptui' out the watermelon seed he accidentally swallowed.
meanings.sent2: The baseball player 'ptui' out the sunflower seed shells during the game.
meanings.sent3: She had to 'ptui' out the bad taste left in her mouth after taking the medicine.
meanings.sent4: The angry llama 'ptui' at the zoo visitors standing too close.
meanings.sent5: The chef had to 'ptui' out the overcooked piece of meat.
